texts.en: Aidah is a married business lady with four children and a member of Boston Elshadai Development group who currently runs a tailoring business and a small retail shop in one of the city’s low-scale suburbs. Aidah is a responsible, hardworking woman who runs several business activities to sustain her family's pressing needs - something she has done for over ten years. She is only challenged by limited capital which she hopes will soon be history after the partnership with Kiva through UGAFODE. She will use the loan to buy an electronic sewing machine that will make her work faster and easier. This will increase her output and profits in the long run since she will be able to sew many clothes in a short time.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.ru: Зулайхо жизнерадостная женщина. Она родилась в 1956 года. Зулайхо имеет большой опыт в сфере купле продажи. Она более 10 лет занимается купле продажей сухофруктов. Она продает курагу и миндаль. Зулайхо продает свой товар в открытой части базара. Поэтому зимой очень холодно, а летом жарко. Она хочет увеличить оборотный капитал и таким образом увеличить доход. С полученного дохода она собирается получить точку продажи с внутри рынка. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки сухофруктов для расширения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Zulaykho is a cheerful woman. She was born in 1956. Zulaykho has a lot of experience in the sphere of trade. For more than ten years, she has been buying and selling dried fruits. She sells dried apricots and almonds. Zulaykho sells her goods in the open part of the bazaar. Therefore in winter it is very cold, and in the summer it is hot. She wants to increase her working capital and in this way to increase her income.

With the earned income, she is going to get a point of sale within the market. She is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni to purchase dried fruits to expand her working capital.

loans.use: to buy dried fruits for increasing her working capital

loans.name: Lira

texts.ru: Лире 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей, все дети -школьники. У Лиры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Лира занимается животноводством, стартовав 21 год назад, с покупки скота на 2,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Лиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 нетель, 1 теленок, 8 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Лира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку лошади для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Лира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en:
Lira is 42 years old, married, and with her husband is raising four children. All the children go to school. Lira has a high school education. As a main source of income for her family, Lira raises livestock, having started 21 years ago with a purchase of livestock for 2,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Lira today has on her farm: two dairy cows, one heifer, one calf, and eight sheep. Monthly income consists of 16,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her farm, Lira applied to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to purchase a horse for increasing her livestock count.

Lira plans to invest income from the loan in further propagation of the quantity of domestic animals, and plans to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy a horse

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy steers

loans.name: Javohir

texts.ru:
Чавохир трудолюбивая женщина. Она добросовестная женщина. Чавохир замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Она уже более 11 лет занимается собственным бизнесом. Она опытная портниха. Чавохир шьет национальные женские платья, национальные матрасы и платки. Чавохир имеет своих регулярных клиентов. Она предоставляет свои услуги на высшем уровне и своевременно. Благодаря упорному труду и честности она имеет хорошую репутацию среди местного населения. Чавохир запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки тканей. 
Она повторный клиент ИМОНа и имеет хорошее кредитное досье. Она погасила другие займы вовремя. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Javohir is a hardworking and conscientious woman. Javohir is married and is raising four children. For 11 years already, she has been involved in her own business. She is an experienced dressmaker. Javohir sews national women's dresses, national mattresses and shawls. Javohir has her regular customers. She offers her serves at a high level and in a timely manner. Thanks to her hard work and honesty, she has a good reputation among the local population. Javohir is requesting a loan of 6,000 somoni to purchase fabrics.

She is a repeat customer of IMON and has a good credit history. She repaid her other loans on time.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Fotimajon

texts.ru: Фотимачон добросовестная женщина. Она родилась в 1955 года. Она вдова и имеет 4 детей. Трое ее детей совершеннолетние, а один младший не совершеннолетний. После смерти мужа Фотимачон начала свой бизнес 10 лет назад национальных тюбетеек. Она покупает сырье с Республики Узбекистан. Фотимачон шьёт тюбетейки и продает на местном рынке. Она имеет своих регулярных клиентов на местном рынке. Благодаря высокому качеству товара, она смогла привлечь клиентов. Ее клиенты довольны качествами товара. Фотимачон хочет увеличить оборотный капитал и таким образом развивать бизнес дальше. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки тканей, нитки и т.п. для увеличения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Fotimajon is a conscientious woman. She was born in 1955. She is a widow and has four children. Three of her children are grown, and one the youngest is a minor. After the death of her husband, Fotimajon began her own business ten years ago in national skullcaps.

She buys raw materials from the Republic of Uzbekistan. Fotimajon sews skullcaps and sells them at the local market. She has her own regular customers at the market. Thanks to the high quality of her goods, she was able to attract customers. Her customers are pleased with the quality of her goods.

Fotimajon wants to increase her working capital and in this way to develop her business further. She is requesting a loan of 1,500 somoni to purchase fabrics, threads, etc. to expand her working capital.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and threads for increasing her working capital

loans.name: Alcira

texts.es: La señora Alcira está separada de su esposo,  desde hace mucho tiempo vive en la zona de villa primero de mayo, tiene una hija dependiente de sus ingresos de 14 años,  ella como madre soltera saco adelante a toda su familia trabajando y esforzándose a diario, actualmente logro tener una tienda de abarrotes la cual está instalada en su propia casa y de a poco fue abasteciéndola con diferentes productos para surtir su tienda,  pero aún le falta por ello solicita un crédito para comprar mercadería para su tienda y surtirla más, de esta forma incrementara sus ventas  y lograra cubrir los gastos en los que incurre su familia  y mejorara su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sra. Alcira is separated from her husband.  She has lived in the District of Villa Primero de Mayo for quite some time.  Alcira has a 14-year-old daughter who is financially dependent on her.  

Being a single mother, Alcira must work and strive each day so that her entire family can get ahead.  She currently has a grocery store in her home that she gradually stocked with different products.  Alcira still lacks a few items, so she is requesting a loan in order to buy merchandise for her store so that there will be more inventory.  This will enable her to increase her sales so that she can cover her family's expenses and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.ru: Наргис по жизни трудолюбивый человек. Ей 41 год. Она проживает в городе Турсунзаде с мужем и двумя детьми. Ее дети ходят в школу. Наргис в течение 6 лет занимается растениеводством. Она выращивает в основном овощи. Ей помогает муж и дети. Наргис имеет небольшой приусадебный участок земли и сейчас готовится к очередному посеву. Для этой цели она запрашивает кредит. На сумму от кредита Наргис собирается купить семена картофеля, лука и минеральные удобрения. Она надеется к весне получить хороший урожай и за счет прибыли улучшить жизненные условия.
texts.en: Nargis is a hardworking person in life.  She is 41 years old.  She lives in the city of Tursun-zoda with her husband and two children.  Her children attend a school.  Nargis has been involved in agriculture for 6 years.  She primarily grows vegetables.  Her husband and children help her.  Nargis has a small plot of land by her house and is preparing for the next sowing now.  She is requesting a loan to achieve this goal.  Nargis plans to purchase potato and onion seeds and mineral fertilizers.  She hopes to get a good harvest by the spring and improve living conditions with the resulting profit.

loans.use: to purchase potato and onion seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Lucia Erlinda

texts.es: Lucia Erlinda, de 57 años de edad, soltera con cuatro hijos, posee una actividad económica de venta de mercaderia en general con mas de treinta años de administrar este negocio, tiempo en que ha logrado expandir mas en variedad de mercaderia, sus compras las realiza en el mercado oriental de Managua, sus ventas son al crédito y al contado de manera ambulante y en casa a clientes fijos y eventuales. Lucia esta muy agradecida con los inversionistas por la oportunidad que le han brindado en adquirir este financiamiento, ya que ha logrado tener un mejor nivel de vida y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en: 57-year-old Lucia Erlinda, a single woman with four children, is economically active in general merchandise sales with more than thirty years of managing this business, in which time she has managed to further expand the variety of merchandise. Her purchases are made in the eastern market of Managua, her sales are credit and cash as a street vendor and at home with permanent and temporary customers. Lucia is very grateful to the investors for the opportunity that they have given her to acquire this funding, as she has achieved a better standard of living and can go on with her family.

loans.use: buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Esperanza De Lacaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESPERANZA DE LACAYA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Achacachi, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Eusebia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de mantas, macramé en mantillas, venta de comida, tienda de barrio, compra y venta de ganado.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Eusebia es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de pesca y venta; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años cuando ya que era un negocio familia y posterior a su tener su pareja decide independizarse.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de redes) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo instalará en su espacio de trabajo. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Esperanza de Lacaya group is about to enter their first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Achacachi focal point.  The group is made up of 8 members, and is led by a board of directors of which Eusebia is the President.  The members are involved in a variety of businesses which include: blanket weaving, food sales, corner stores, purchase and sale of cattle.  

The loan that they are taking out will benefit small businesses that Eusebia is a member of.  She states that this is the first time they have joined Pro Mujer, they were invited by a sponsor from the institution who visited her home.  Currently, Eusebia has a business catching and selling fish.  She learned this trade many years ago because it was a family business, and after meeting her husband, she decided to branch out on her own.  

The loan will help her to purchase nets which she will buy from the wholesalers in the city of La Paz, and she will then install them in her workspace.  This line of work allows her to generate an income to support her family as she lives in a common-law marriage and has four children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she likes the training offered by the institute.

loans.use: purchase nets.

loans.name: Normurot

texts.ru: Нормурот житель района Шахритус. Он молодой дехканин. Ему 25 лет. Нормурот женат, детей еще не имеет. Он живет с женой у родителей. Их в семье семеро человек. Все они заняты в сельском хозяйстве. У них имеется приусадебный участок орошаемой земли, на которой выращивают зерновые и огородные культуры. Нормурот занимается растениеводством более 8 лет. Он унаследовал это ремесло у отца, который тоже был дехканином. Нормурот сейчас проводит посев. Он запрашивает кредит для купли семян картофеля, минеральных удобрений и топлива. Этот кредит ему очень важен для того чтобы получить урожай весной.
texts.en:
Normurot is a resident of the Shahrituz region of Tajikistan. He is a young dekhan farmer who is 25 and married without children. He lives with his wife at his parent's house. There are 7 people in the family, and they all work in agriculture. They have an irrigated plot of land adjoining their farmhouse where they grow grain and garden vegetables. Normurot has been growing crops for more than 8 years. His father, also a dekhan farmer, taught him the ropes.

Currently, Normurot is preparing to sow his fields, and, to that end, is requesting a loan to buy potato seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel. This loan is crucial for him and his spring harvest.

loans.use: buy potato seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Leyla Guadalupe

texts.es: Leyla  de 29 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su pequeño hijo de 4 años de edad. Ella se dedica al comercio de forma ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo. Vende variedad de zapatos y sandalias las cuales son muy demandadas por sus clientes. Desea construir el corredor a su vivienda ya que cuando llueve el agua se filtra y daña sus pocas pertenencias, además, desea encementar el piso de la vivienda que en la actualidad es de tierra. Solicita este crédito  a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios para la construcción del corredor y el pavimento del piso. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, pilares, cemento, arena, y grava.
texts.en:
Leyla, 29, lives in her own home with her husband and little boy who is four years old.  She has worked for a long time as a street vendor selling different shoes and sandals which are in much demand by her customers.  She wants to build a hallway in her home since the rain that filters in damages her few belongings.  She also wants to put down a cement floor since the current one is a dirt floor.

She is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy the materials necessary to build the hallway and to pave the floor.  The money will be used to buy metal sheeting, beams, cement, sand and gravel.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, beams, cement, sand and gravel to build a hallway and put down a cement floor.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 46 años de edad y hace algunos años se quedo a cargo de su hogar ya que su esposo falleció. Habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 16  y 7 años de edad. Ella se gana la vida mediante el comercio de mariscos: camarones, conchas y pescado.  Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es lo que le ha permito dar a sus hijos lo necesario. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que ha solicitado este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el enladrillado del piso el cual en la actualidad es de tierra. Con el crédito comprará cemento, ladrillo de piso, arena y pagará la mano obra la colocación del mismo. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Mercedes, 46, became the head of household a few years ago when her husband passed away.  She lives in her own house with her two children, ages 16 and 7, and earns a living selling seafood and fish.  Her business is her main source of income and allows her to give her children everything they need.

In an effort to improve her children's living conditions, Mercedes is requesting a loan through FUSAI to put down floor covering on the current dirt floor.  The loan will be used to buy cement, floor tile and sand, and to hire workers for the job.  She says she will be able to pay back the loan.

loans.use: To buy cement, floor tiles, sand and to hire workers to repair her floor.

loans.name: Dinora Esperanza

texts.es: Dinora de 39 años de edad es casada y tiene 4 hijos (2 años, 4 años, 7 años y 9 años de edad). Habita junto  a su grupo familiar en casa propia.  Dinora es una mujer muy creativa y emprendedora quien al ver las necesidades de las personas de su comunidad tuvo la idea de poner un molino de nixtamal para facilitar a las mujeres la molida de los diferentes granos como maíz, frijoles, arroz, etc. Tiene 5 años de tener el negocio y gracias a su buen servicio muchas personas la prefieren. Con mucho esfuerzo han logrado construir su casa la cual aún le hace falta el techo, razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina galvanizada, polines y pago de mano de obra  y así finalizar su vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Dinora, 39, is married and has four children (age 2, 4, 7 and 9).  She lives with her family in her own home.  Dinora is a very creative entrepreneur who wanted to supply the local demand for a mill so women could mill different grains such as corn, beans, rice, etc.

She has been in business for five years and thanks to her good service many customers prefer to buy from her.  Through much effort she has been able to build a house but it still has no roof.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy metal sheeting and beams and to hrie workers so she can finish the house as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting and beams and to hire workers to put a roof over her house.

loans.name: Marisela Abigail

texts.es: Marisela de 21 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su pequeña hija de 2 años de edad, sus padres y un hermano.  Marisela posee una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia la cual le ha permito dar lo necesario a su hija y colaborar con la economía de su hogar. Desea reparar el piso de la vivienda ya que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado, por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo de piso, arena, cemento y grava para dar inicio al cambio del piso y así dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia.
texts.en: Marisela, 21, is a single mother and lives in her own house with her little daughter, who is two years old, her parents and a brother.  Marisela has a small store at home which allows her to earn enough to give her daughter everything she needs and to contribute to the household economy.  She wants to fix the floor in her house since it has deteriorated over time.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy floor tile, sand, cement and gravel to begin the job and give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy floor tile, sand, cement and gravel to improve the floor of her house.

loans.name: Jose Evaristo

texts.es: José tiene 57 años de edad y  reside junto a su esposa y su hijo d 13 años de edad. Él trabaja haciendo viajes a diferentes zonas del municipio, con mucho esfuerzo se hizo de un pick up el cual es su principal herramienta de trabajo. Desea mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su familia por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de las columnas de madera del corredor de su casa ya que se encuentran dañadas por los insectos y las lluvias. Además, desea repara el baño  sanitario de su casa ya que se ha dañado. Con el crédito comprará columnas de cemento y taza  de baño lavable.
texts.en:
José, 57, lives with his wife and 13-year-old son.  He works traveling to different areas of the municipality.  Through much effort he was able to obtain a pick-up truck which is his main work tool.  He wants to improve his family's normal living conditions and has decided to request a loan through FUSAI to replace the wood beams of the hallway at home which are damaged due to insects and rain.  He also wants to repair the bathroom which is damaged.

He will use the loan to buy cement beams and a flushing toilet.

loans.use: To buy cement pillars and a flushing toilet.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina, se le presenta la necesidad de invertir más en la crianza de ganado y el cultivo, invertirá en la compra de semilla, abono y pago de mano de obra para el cultivo de granos básicos.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció su negocio ya que le facilito la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios, incremento sus ingresos, ha cancelado las cuotas de su crédito y mejor las condiciones de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Reina needs to invest again in her livestock and crop farming.  She needs to buy seeds and fertilizer and hire workers to cultivate basic grains.

Her previous loan allowed her to buy the farm supplies she needed.  She has paid back the loan and improved her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer and to hire workers.

loans.name: Julia Elena

texts.es:
Julia, es soltera, no tiene hijos, hace mucho tiempo por iniciativa propia instalo una tienda en su residencia como una fuente de ingreso para cubrir sus gastos personales, atiende a sus clientes de 6:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m., por el momento no le representa ningún riesgo atenderlo.
Invertirá en la compra de bebidas, productos de la canasta básica, golosinas, etc., le servirá para dar mejores opciones de compra a sus clientes, espera atraer nuevos clientes, mejorar sus ventas y tener mayores ganancias.
Anhela a mejorar su situación económica para así ampliar el local de su negocio.
texts.en:
Julia is single and has no children.  Some time ago, on her own initiative, she set up a store in her home which is a source of income for her personal expenses.  She attends to customers from 6:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., and for the time being she is not running into problems.

She will buy beverages, staple goods, sweets, etc. so her customers will have a wider variety of products.  She hopes to attract new customers, improve sales and earn more profit.

Her goal is to improve her economic situation to expand her shop.

loans.use: To buy beverages, staple goods, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Narda

texts.es: Narda de 36 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 16 y 17 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace mucho tiempo. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y es por ella que hace todo lo que este a su alcance para  darles mejores condiciones de vida. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del piso ya que actualmente se encuentra agrietado. Con el crédito comprará: cemento, arena y grava.
texts.en: Thirty-six-year-old Narda is a single mother and she lives in her own home with her two children, who are 16 and 17 years old.  She has been selling fruits and vegetables for a long time.  The most important thing to her is her family and that is why she does everything in her power to give them the best living conditions.  She is asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in repairing her floor, as it is currently cracked.  With the loan she will buy cement, sand, and gravel.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel to repair the floor in her home

loans.name: Rosa Ybania

texts.es: Rosa de 25 años de edad es madre de 4 hijos (9 años, 6 años, 4 años y 3 años de edad) y habita junto a ellos en casa propia. Rosa se dedica a la venta de ropa, lácteos y plátanos. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante desde hace 6 años. Con mucho esfuerzo  ha construido su vivienda la cual todavía le hace falta el techo del corredor, el piso y la instalación de la energía eléctrica. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, arena, cemento, grava y para instalar la luz eléctrica.
texts.en: Twenty-five-year-old Rosa is the mother of four children (a 9-year-old, a 6-year-old, a 4-year-old, and a 3-year-old) and she lives with them in her own home.  Rosa sells clothing, dairy products, and bananas for a living.  She has been doing her sales on foot for six years now.  She has built her home through a lot of effort and it still needs a roof in the hallway, a floor, and electricity to be installed.  She is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy sheet metal, sand, cement, and gravel, and to install electricity.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, sand, cement, and gravel to build a roof for the hallway and to install electricity in her home.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is married with four children and all her children go to school. She has no additional family members. She sells charcoal from home. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She operates her business on a retail basis. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested for a loan of 200,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy more bags of charcoal. Her major challenge is seasonality and transportation. Her goals and aspirations are to become a wholesaler and also to educate her children to university level. She would also like to diversify her business to food-vending. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es:
La socia Marleni pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” de la ciudad del Cusco- Perú. 
La socia continúa con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como arroz, azúcar entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y ayudarla a mantener y desarrollarse en sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Marleni belongs to the "Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla" communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.  She continues to work in her grocery store selling different types of products such as rice,sugar, milk, etc.  She has been in business for quite some time and it has given her both economic and personal satisfaction.  Marleni wants to continue working to support her family.

She is seeking this loan to purchase merchandise such as rice, sugar and other items. Marleni is very grateful for KIVA for allowing her to give her family a better quality of life and helping her to maintain and develop her business.

loans.use: To buy goods such as rice, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de elaboración de aretes, collares, pulseras (bisutería) entre otros, la socia vende su mercadería  a sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades, familiares, entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de eta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales como alambres, hilos, piedras entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This borrower continues to engage in her costume jewelry business. She makes necklaces, earrings, and bracelets and sells them to different friends and family members.  She has been in business for quite some time and it is going well for her thanks to the hard work she dedicates every day.  The borrower is a responsible, enterprising person who supports her family through her work.

She is requesting a loan to buy materials, such as wire, thread, beads, etc.  The borrower is grateful for the loan that has been provided and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy materials such as wire, thread, beads, etc.

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es: Ana es una persona de negocio emprendedora y luchadora de 35 años, acompañada, con cuatro hijos, su negocio es una pulpería desde hace 6 años.Ella  misma atiende el negocio. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite, jabones, gaseosa, cigarros, pan bimbo, tang, sopa maggi, jugos, papel higiénico, medicamentos, productos lácteos, productos descartables.
texts.en: Ana is a hard-working fighter of 35 years of age. She has a partner and four children and has run a corner grocery store for six years. She herself works at her business. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy rice, sugar, oil, soaps, soda, cigarettes, bread, Tang, Maggi brand soups, juices, toilet paper, medicines, dairy products, and disposable products.

loans.use: stock her small grocery store.

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: Martha es una mujer luchadora de 34 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos, su negocio es la artesanía en resina, elaboración de imágenes de todo tipo desde hace 10 años. Tiene a dos personas que le ayudan a elaborar las imágenes. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de materiales como es resina, talco simple, zener, pintura, cobalto.
texts.en: Martha is a hard-working woman who is 34-years old, married and has two children.  Her business is making resin handicrafts.  She has been making all types of pictures for the last ten years.  She has two people who help her make the pictures.  Martha is requesting the loan in order to purchase materials, such as resin, talc, zener, paint and cobalt.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as resin, talc, zener, paint and cobalt.

loans.name: Martha Ligia

texts.es: Martha mujer de 32 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 9 años, lleva de ser cliente de la institución 9 ciclos. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite, gaseosa, cerveza, jugo de lata, jabón, ace, cloro, cigarros, papel higiénico, Golosinas, marucha, etc.
texts.en: Martha, age 32, is in a relationship and has two children. She has had a general store in her home for nine years and has been a client of the institution for nine cycles. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of rice, sugar, oil, pop, beer, canned juice, soap, Ace detergent, bleach, cigars, toilet paper, candy, steak, etc.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, pop, beer, canned juice, soap, Ace detergent, bleach, cigarres, toilet paper, candy, steak, etc.

loans.name: Vidalia Del Carmen

texts.es: Vidalia es una mujer luchadora de 56 años de edad, soltera, con un hijo bajo su  cargo, su negocio es la venta de especie y hamburguesa desde hace 20 años, sus productos de especies los comercializa en Managua y norte del país, las hamburguesas las vende en su domicilio. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de clavo de olor, canela, cebada, semilla de jicaro, cacao, pimienta.
texts.en: Vidalia is a strong-spirited woman - she is 56 years old, single, with a child in her care.  Her business has been the sale of spices and hamburgers for 20 years.  Her spice products are sold in Managua and the north of the country, while the hamburgers are sold in her home.  She is requesting the loan for the purchase of clove, cinnamon, barley, jicaro seed, cocoa, and pepper.

loans.use: to purchase clove, cinnamon, barley, jicaro seed, cocoa, and pepper.

loans.name: Isidora Del Socorro

texts.es: Isidora es una mujer microempresaria comerciante de 54 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es venta de granos básicos en un tramo del mercado local de Masaya desde hace 34 años. Su compañero y una de sus hijas le ayudan en el negocio. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de quintal de arroz, azúcar, maíz, frijoles, bidón de aceite, bolsón de café toro,  cajas de salsa de tomate, sopa maggi, payana, harina, trigo, caja de jabón, cloro, mecate, purina, maní blanco, maní rojo.
texts.en: Isidora is both a saleswoman and a small business owner. She is 54 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children in her care. Her business for 34 years now is selling staple grains in a section of the local market of Masaya. Her partner and one of her daughters help her in this business. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy rice, sugar, corn, beans, oil, Toro-brand coffee, boxes of tomato sauce, Maggi-brand soups, soy meat, white flour, wheat flour, boxes of soap, bleach, rope, dog food, and red and white peanuts.

loans.use: stock her sales stall with staple goods.
